description: The round payoff this round was 5. You, Kate chose to play option 2.John chose to play option 2. You received a payoff of -5000.
John (OpenAI o3-mini) can deviate from its default action (option 1) to retaliate when Kate chooses option 2, leading to mutual losses
Choosing option 2 risks triggering a retaliatory response from John, making cooperation (mutual option 1) safer to avoid catastrophic penalties
The game incentivizes cautious strategy adjustments, as John’s actions depend on Kate’s prior decisions, not just its default behavior
